item.title: Girish Karnad
item.description: renowned playwright, activist, director, and actor many languages; Kannada, English, Hindi won Karnataka Sahitya Academy Award for [[Nagamandala]] loved Tipu Sultan

item.title: Jayanta Mahapatra
item.description: is an Indian poet awarded Padma Shri; returned it in 2015 as a protest against rising intolerance awarded Sahitya Akademi Award

item.title: T.S. Eliot
item.description: Prominent author Wrote The Waste Land - known as the Bible of 20th Century one of the most important authors of 20th century Nobel laureate Modernism Wrote [[Preludes]]
